snippet: Have a question for the governor of New Jersey or the mayor of New York? Might be best to wait for cooler temperatures.
abstract: Tempers among politicians in the New York City region are running hot as summer temperatures rise; both New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie have recently had angry exchanges with reporters.

byline.contributor: Adeshina Emmanuel, Vivian Yee and Kate Zernike contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Have a question for the governor of New Jersey or the mayor of New York? Might be best to wait for cooler temperatures.

headline.seo: As the Sun Bears Down, Christie Growls, and Bloomberg Barks a Little, Too
